# harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving a GPG Signing Key from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key" "example" {
  id = "signing_key_id"
}

output "key_id" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key.example.key_id
}

output "key_name" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key.example.key_name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the signing key.

### Read-Only

- `ascii_armor` (String, Sensitive) ASCII-armored GPG public key.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `key_id` (String) GPG key ID.
- `key_name` (String) GPG key name.
- `updated_at` (String) Last updated timestamp.
- `user` (String) User who uploaded the key.
